entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5 except plus 2 along the Strait. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5 except plus 2 along the Strait. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 14 April 2023
